name: Turmeric
benefits: Anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, supports joint health and immunity.
care: Partial to full sun, well-draining soil, regular watering.

medicines.ingredients: 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 cup water, honey (optional)
medicines.instructions: Boil water, add turmeric, simmer for 5-10 minutes. Strain and drink warm. Helps with inflammation and immunity.

medicines.ingredients: 1/4 cup turmeric powder, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1/2 cup water
medicines.instructions: Mix into a paste, store in fridge. Add to warm milk for a soothing drink. Enhances absorption and reduces joint pain.

medicines.ingredients: Turmeric powder, water or coconut oil
medicines.instructions: Mix into paste, apply to wounds, cover with bandage. Change daily. Promotes healing and prevents infection.

medicines.ingredients: 1 tsp turmeric, 1 cup milk, pinch of cinnamon
medicines.instructions: Heat milk, add turmeric and cinnamon, stir well. Drink warm before bed. Aids sleep and reduces stress.

name: Ginger
benefits: Aids digestion, reduces nausea, anti-inflammatory properties.
care: Partial shade, rich soil, consistent moisture.

medicines.ingredients: 1-2 slices fresh ginger, 1 cup water, lemon and honey (optional)
medicines.instructions: Boil water with ginger for 5-10 minutes. Strain and drink warm. Soothes digestion and nausea.

medicines.ingredients: Fresh ginger root, vodka or glycerin
medicines.instructions: Chop ginger, fill a jar, cover with alcohol. Steep for 4-6 weeks, strain. Take 1-2 tsp daily for anti-inflammatory effects.

medicines.ingredients: Grated ginger, warm cloth
medicines.instructions: Wrap grated ginger in cloth, apply to sore muscles for 15-20 minutes. Relieves pain and reduces swelling.

medicines.ingredients: Fresh ginger slices, honey
medicines.instructions: Layer ginger in jar, cover with honey. Let sit for 1 week. Take 1 tsp daily for immunity boost.

name: Curry Leaves
benefits: Rich in antioxidants, aids digestion, supports hair health.
care: Full sun, well-draining soil, moderate watering.

medicines.ingredients: Fresh curry leaves, coconut oil
medicines.instructions: Heat oil with leaves until leaves darken. Cool, strain, and apply to scalp. Promotes hair growth and health.

medicines.ingredients: 10-15 curry leaves, 1 cup water
medicines.instructions: Boil leaves in water for 5 minutes. Strain and drink. Aids digestion and reduces blood sugar.

medicines.ingredients: Dried curry leaves
medicines.instructions: Grind dried leaves into powder. Take 1 tsp daily with water. Boosts iron levels and immunity.

medicines.ingredients: Curry leaves, water
medicines.instructions: Boil leaves in water, cool, strain. Use as eye wash for conjunctivitis. Apply gently with cotton.

name: Chamomile
benefits: Promotes sleep, calming properties, aids digestion.
care: Full sun, well-draining soil, moderate watering.

medicines.ingredients: 1-2 tsp dried chamomile flowers, 1 cup hot water, honey (optional)
medicines.instructions: Steep flowers in hot water for 5-10 minutes. Strain and drink before bed. Calms nerves and aids sleep.

medicines.ingredients: Steeped chamomile tea, clean cloth
medicines.instructions: Soak cloth in cooled tea, apply to skin for 10-15 minutes. Soothes irritated skin or eyes.

medicines.ingredients: Chamomile tea bags or flowers, warm bath water
medicines.instructions: Add steeped chamomile to bath water. Soak for 15-20 minutes. Relaxes muscles and soothes skin.

medicines.ingredients: Dried chamomile flowers, alcohol or glycerin
medicines.instructions: Fill jar with flowers, cover with alcohol. Steep 4-6 weeks, strain. Take 20-30 drops for digestive upset.

name: Tulsi
benefits: Boosts immunity, reduces stress, helps cough and cold.
care: Requires 4-6 hours of sunlight, moderate watering, well-drained soil.

medicines.ingredients: 5-10 fresh tulsi leaves, 1 cup water, honey (optional)
medicines.instructions: Boil leaves in water for 5 minutes. Strain and drink warm. Boosts immunity and reduces stress.

medicines.ingredients: Tulsi leaves, ginger, black pepper, honey
medicines.instructions: Boil ingredients together, simmer for 10 minutes. Drink warm. Helps with cough and cold.

name: Neem
benefits: Natural antiseptic, purifies blood, pest repellent.
care: Grows in dry climate, minimal watering once established.

medicines.ingredients: Neem leaves, sesame or coconut oil
medicines.instructions: Infuse leaves in oil for 2-3 weeks in sun. Strain and apply to skin for acne or infections.

medicines.ingredients: Neem leaves, water
medicines.instructions: Grind leaves into paste, apply to affected skin. Wash off after 20 minutes. Treats skin conditions.

name: Aloe Vera
benefits: Soothes skin, aids wound healing, digestive support.

medicines.ingredients: Fresh aloe vera leaf
medicines.instructions: Cut leaf, extract gel, apply directly to skin. Heals burns, wounds, and moisturizes.

medicines.ingredients: Aloe vera gel, water
medicines.instructions: Blend gel with water, drink diluted. Supports digestion and detoxification.

name: Mint
benefits: Aids digestion, fresh aroma, culinary herb.
care: Partial shade, regular watering, can be invasive.

medicines.ingredients: Fresh mint leaves, 1 cup hot water, honey (optional)
medicines.instructions: Steep leaves in hot water for 5 minutes. Strain and drink. Soothes stomach and freshens breath.

medicines.ingredients: Mint leaves, olive oil
medicines.instructions: Infuse leaves in oil for 2 weeks. Use as a topical rub for headaches or muscle pain.

name: Ashwagandha
care: Full sun, sandy soil, low to moderate water.

name: Brahmi (Bacopa)
benefits: Supports memory and focus, calming herb.
care: Partial sun, moist soil, regular watering.

name: Giloy (Guduchi)
care: Climbing vine, full to partial sun, moderate water.

name: Moringa (Drumstick)
care: Full sun, drought tolerant once established.
